Group.Group Name: Ansatsu Senjutsu Tokushu Butai, Mendoi Fansubs & Conclave Fansubbing

Good Comments: Karaoke's pretty... but editing, styling and other areas lack quite a bit.
Expect nothing more but positive, maybe the release speed will be a bit slower.
It's perfect. Even the translation of the OP flows really well.
Bad Comments: 576p, great hardsubbed kara, no troll-like behavior = quality release. Only styling flaw is 1-pixel borders.
Great quality and translation with some nice typesetting. 8/10

Looks good but there are a few translations that really don't make any sense. Minor though. Timing was a little fast a couple of times I had to pause. But that happens. Can't wait for their next installment.
Great subs as expected from two quality groups. Logo and kara are nice touches, translation is nice too.
Great job from these guys, as usual
Quality translations.  Not random commercials inserted like gg...
slow as hell and lousy translation compared to eclipse.
